divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching tv and the tv cep turning on and off the lites were dimming iturn on some music thinking it is a surge and my cd player stops workingthen therefrigearater stops working i look out side and then my dog starts barkingmybird is trying to bite me and i see a big ornge ball take off and start zigzaging around and not going aroundso i g and get my cancorder and i come backwith a brand new batery i turn it on and after a secondthe batery indacater gosedownlike the batery is geting dranedthe camera is dead and i take out mysellpone to call my friend to tell him i saw a ufoand my phone is lo on bateryand diedby that time it zoomed away my bird and my dog ceteled down. i feltprety calm during the event
